website_summaries.verdict: Larger users may find the fit a little snug, but this convertible model features a very comfortable seat and solid steel framing.
cons: Upper weight limit may be overstated
Bucket is shallow and can cause splash back

customer_reviews.title: the seat is a bit uncomfortable but not the worst crapper I’ve ever planted my self on The only ...
customer_reviews.text: Not rock solid but still felt very safe, the seat is a bit uncomfortable but not the worst crapper I’ve ever planted my self on The only real improvements I would suggest are a cup holder, magazine rack and USB charging port but that’s certainly more than one can or should expect. I smiled at the company sending me a congratulatory email, as if to say congratulations, now you won’t be pooping on the floor anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Woody Glade

customer_reviews.title: Child's chair
customer_reviews.text: A bit small in the width for the clientele they advertised. This product is supposed to be for the larger individual. My fault. I should have looked at the measurements but I have ordered three such chairs before (not from this manufacturer) and they were much wider so the assumption was there. Overall, the craftsmanship is great. A fine little chair for a small in that it is both narrow and not very tall at all (Mickey Rooney size). I think must have been a corporate decision on how to save on material.
customer_reviews.author: Lleogn Longhair

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 89-year-old mom who's recovering from a back injury. We're both very satisfied with this commode. It's well designed. It was easy to unfold the frame and adjust the height of the legs when I took it out of the shopping box, and snap the seat and lid onto the frame. The frame is lightweight but sturdy. My mom is 5'6" tall and weighs about 185 pounds, and she sits on it with no problem. The carrying handle and lid on the commode bucket are practical features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought this product was for a person who was ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was for a person who was 250lbs it is not- my mom is 240 and she can barely fit the seat. She had a stroke and is paralyzed on her right side. She’s right handed so it’s very challenging for her.
customer_reviews.author: TaShema Rembert

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy. I was concerned about it being sturdy enough because my mom is on a walker but she can transition easily from the walker to the commode with no problem. I like the lid and the bucket is easily removed for clean up. Also, being able to adjust the height is a plus, esoecislly for short petite woman like my mom. My mom loves the side arm rests so she can sit there and take her time. Love this product and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It is a very good value, built strong and makes a great travel ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this item. It is a very good value, built strong and makes a great travel commode.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I needed to be able to transfer from a wheelchair to the commode. The folding legs were not sturdy enough for me. I am 140 pounds but still I was not comfortable with how it wobbled. Ended gettin a commode that did not collapse
customer_reviews.author: william miller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but not for a pudgy booty or hips!
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy but it's not for a heavier butt or bigger hips. You have to butter your hips to slide in and out of this. I'm having back surgery in a few weeks and this isn't going to work. I need to kind of turn and twist a little to get off the seat and turning and twisting is a big no no after surgery!!!! My dumb self threw out the box so maybe I can donate it or give it to someone else in need with a smaller booty and hips. 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: My mother loves her new bedside toilet. It is a lot easier in the night than heading up the hallway to the restroom. Right now she is having a lot a back pain so this is working for us very well. I am 168pd and it holds me well. She is 124 pounds and is a great fit for her. I was able to assembly it very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Easy to assemble, adjust, and clean. Strong and sturdy unit for a larger guy. Would have liked the toilet seat to be just a bit deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S. Kosentos

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, great price & quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Vive Bedside Commode for a family member. True to their advertisement it was super easy to put together! It’s very sturdy and fits well in the bedroom right next to the bed. Easy to keep clean with the removable parts. This was a great purchase! Has a video to watch on line how to assemble and questions answered. I forgot to mention the reasonable price. Very affordable. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: The quality and convenience are perfect for our home-life situation. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.text: The commode arrived just yesterday, was set up, and used just last night! My 91-year-old Ma just luvz this convenience. She weighs only 102 lbs. and is 5 feet tall and it fits her perfectly. I LUV the fact that she is able to accommodate HERSELF in the middle of the night and I get to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: sal72

customer_reviews.title: Defective item would like to get my money back
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my mom she used it two times before the back leg collapsed because she was in rehab I went past the return date and now I'm currently unable to return an $80 item that I can no longer use because the back leg does not stay in place
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fits well over a standard toilet
customer_reviews.text: Used for a 190lb man after knee surgery. works well over a toilet with the shoot. We took it into our walk-in shower to use but needed to push it against the wall to stabilize. Easy to set up and clean.
customer_reviews.author: seattle reader

customer_reviews.title: Really helps me.
customer_reviews.text: I should have realized that it was narrower. It is very handy and was simple to assemble. NO tools needed. Nice to have, but a bit narrower than I realized. A bit scary .
customer_reviews.author: Julie Vee

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and solid unit
customer_reviews.text: This unit is as described. It's a very solid and sturdy unit highly recommended the solid seat is made of plastic and is a little flimsy however the secondary seat is very sturdy. Chairs
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Ferrel

customer_reviews.title: Great commode
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it fit great over my toilet which doesn't have much room between the toilet and the sink. It is adjustable to many different heights, lightweight, easy to assemble, cleans very well, and folds up to boot. The seat is a little flimsy but works for the person using it who is about 180 lbs. I don't think it would be good for someone much bigger than that.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Kierney

customer_reviews.title: Papas Poop Place!
customer_reviews.text: Seat itself should be larger, but is lite weight and portable We use it for additional toilet in our home with two elderly people
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing it was not in good condition when delivered
customer_reviews.text: The product functions but was flawed in mfg. The brackets for the seat and lid were not aligned correctly and can not be used. I clamped the lid and seat to another location and it is OK. Disappointing it was not in good condition when delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Stewart

customer_reviews.title: A Fine healthcare Item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and it really served us well. It is light and portable, yet very sturdy and supportive. It can be used as a chair commode or placed over the toilet[the bucket is removable] to provide arm support.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond E. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great solution for my elderly father. He is not large, about 160 lbs, but it has been sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: k. g.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as promised, easy setup and cleanup. This product provided me peace of mind for my mom’s usage while recovering from surgery. Best investment I could have made. Oh I forgot to mention..very affordable/worth every dime spent
customer_reviews.author: Sade

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: Good for over the toilet, or at the bedside at night. Compact enough for over the toilet between cabinet and tub with room to maneuver with walker
customer_reviews.author: CJEinCLT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just exactly what I needed for my wide behind. The adjustable height is very accommodating for my short legs, Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Green  Dog

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Item is sturdy and performs as expected. The color was not what was ordered. Seat and bowl were not white as expected, but were grey
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Ultra stable and easy to use. Even though I am in a weaken state, the commode is easy to clean with a very large bucket and firm handle. Easy grip chair rails
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable item
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, comfortable, functional commode. The only downside for me was the shallow bucket. We changed it out with a deeper one & it works as expected. And it’s nice & wide.
customer_reviews.author: Erbo2Jerbo

customer_reviews.title: Is excellent buy for the price. Probably even better than the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.text: Really great product I thought it would be very flimsy because the price was low but it is very sturdy. Which I'm not a large person but it was nice knowing it wouldn't fall considering I had just had back surgery. So I would say it was a great buy if you need one.
customer_reviews.author: bchurch08

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport ,assemble and store it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my boss and we love it, is very easy to ensemble, clean and store when you don't need it and easy to carry and transport ( to her daughter's house when she visits her).
customer_reviews.author: Maria Barragan

customer_reviews.title: Performs as Expected
customer_reviews.text: A bedside commode is not a product that one is likely to rave about, so suffice it to say that it gets 5 stars for living up to expectations. Now if it could cure the conditions that makes its use necessary, THAT would be something!
customer_reviews.author: Pat OToole

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it will do well for my needs. Very well constructed. I like that it can be used with or without the “chamber pot” . My preference to use it over the stationary toilet but that’s a personal call.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Nault

customer_reviews.title: Simple-to-Use Bedside Commode
customer_reviews.text: Product is quite easy to install; looks and works good. Would buy from them again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Hall

customer_reviews.title: The common load was very easy to assemble it is sturdy and fits easily into ...
customer_reviews.text: The common load was very easy to assemble it is sturdy and fits easily into my bedroom I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: audiophile

customer_reviews.title: Quality??
customer_reviews.text: Got it in plenty of time. Was suppose to be for large butt, however was standered size...and was very flimsiest bed sided toilet I’ve ever came across. I am a strong buyer and will continue to buy Amizon as I am very satisfied with everything I’ve bought other then this last order. Thank you Mary Ann
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what my mother needed during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Not for bariatric use
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfectly good commode chair, however it was intended for a person who weighs 250 pounds and she could not fit in it. Since it says for bariatric use, it was surprising. It was for use at an independent living center so we kept it and will use for a smaller person in the future.
customer_reviews.author: donna stein

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and was just as it was described. Would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: droc42

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together! Sterdy, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: The commode by Vive is very comfortable, and not too bulky or heavy
customer_reviews.text: The commode by Vive is very comfortable, and not too bulky or heavy. Its compactness makes it easy to place in most living space. Finally, the commode is priced just right! Dr. Michelle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together, and is a big help in taking care of a person living in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Marty O'Toole

customer_reviews.title: Good quality very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Safe and easy to assemble. Very sturdy abd well made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered as a riser in a small bathroom. The riser seems to be well made and does not have "feet" sticking out that could cause a person to trip. The size fit the small bathroom and it is easily adjusted for height. We would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy for my grandmother. Adjusted to the perfect height for her. She’s very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kclarke892289

customer_reviews.title: Sturdily built and folds away nicely when not in use
customer_reviews.text: Received actually a day ahead of schedule. Everything as advertised. Sturdily built and folds away nicely when not in use. Though not needed in my case, customer support has been in touch to ensure everything OK even before delivery. No hiding by these guys.
customer_reviews.author: kerzam

customer_reviews.title: The adjustable height was the selling point for us. ...
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable height was the selling point for us. Due to lack of mobility getting up from lower commodes made it difficult. We used this to replace an elevated commode seat, which made all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Circes50

customer_reviews.title: seat/potty
customer_reviews.text: knee surgery not until Oct 23...expecting no problems...will know then
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Your commode was a life saver. Easy assembly and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M Springer

customer_reviews.title: Stable. Comes assembled with snap on pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I have recommended this commode to the caregiver/disabled people in need. Positive feedback every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customers

customer_reviews.title: Commode/ hood length
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was a little disappointed in the fact that in order to insure the hood part of the commode extends down into the toilet we have to remove the toilet seat which is a nuisance. Thank goodness we have a new toilet with an easy to remove seat but when the commode isn't in use we have to put the seat back on. After it arrived I realized the brand name wasn't the one we originally had been using thus the mistake was of my own doing. However, for those just purchasing the commode don't be surprised if the hood isn't a bit short.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Momma

customer_reviews.title: That this is collapsible and height is adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Husband is mobility challenged and requires this item when we travel by car. It is very compact and easy to transport and is adjustable. Great invention.
customer_reviews.author: Eillene Rehmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Extremely sturdy. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sandra p rosen

customer_reviews.title: Did work very good
customer_reviews.text: I broke the pelvis in a accident and the toilet was to low, so I got this to help with the height, now I don't need this anymore, but when I needed, this did job ,it was great.
customer_reviews.author: levi possidonio ribeiro filho

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strong, light, nite As advertised is great product. Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Titi

customer_reviews.title: Well made commode
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, has plenty of height adjustments, and great, sturdy arm/hand bar.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: My sis is very happy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my sister who broke her back, she never wanted to admit that she needed it so I ordered it without her knowing about it needless to say she is very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Peggy J Maruska

customer_reviews.title: This model is much more comfortable than one used after previous surgery
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. Purchased for husband recovering from knee replacement surgery. This model is much more comfortable than one used after previous surgery. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: The product allows my loved one security with the handles for support and security of staying in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Elias

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does what it was bought for. No to assembly required. It was set up in about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to assemble. Folds and unfolds easily for transportation. Works just like a normal commode and is very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Cadillac Carl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Commode
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a friend and she says it is perfect for her use.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: almost all ease of order and very few mistakes for beginners
customer_reviews.text: the only difficulty for the beginner that I am is returning an item that doesn't fit my means
customer_reviews.author: lorac

customer_reviews.title: Bedsid commode
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and serves my need for a bedside commode. Thank you;
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Commode was very easy to assemble and was just as seller described.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised!! Awesome product. Very sturdy and easy to assemble!!!
customer_reviews.author: G H.

customer_reviews.title: The price was affordable.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my friend who will be having hip surgery soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product. Put together easily, very sturdy, splash guard good, bucket with top and handle easy to empty. Easy to convert. Easy to clean. Excellent buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother for easy bathroom access during the night. Sturdy product, does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My only quibble....the lid is very hard to grasp with one hand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Inexpensive and received in 2 days. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my Mother, who lives in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mother, who lives in Az. I live in England. I have not heard any complaints about the commode.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good arms for handhold and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, adjustable, good arms for handhold and sturdy. Currently being used over a toilet for its handhold/arms and height.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Best commode for the price
customer_reviews.text: Commode is perfect. It's sturdy , safe, and stable when being used. The price was amazing for the quality of this product. The frame is white and it is actually attractive. Would recommend to anyone !
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: haven"t usedit yet, but it seems to be what ...
customer_reviews.text: haven"t usedit yet,but it seems to be what we"ll need in the futher to take on trips.
customer_reviews.author: jerry l brown

customer_reviews.title: Appreciation for a great product .
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service. Very helpful in my wife's recovery. Would recommend this product with high marks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and white color looks good with our fixtures
customer_reviews.text: We move it from bedside at night to bathroom during the day. Works great and white color looks good with our fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Vive Health provides great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Vive Health provides great customer service! We have a Moen premium bedside commode for my 93 year old grandmother and wanted to purchase another one. The product was discontinued and I thought I wouldn't find something comparable. This commode is much cheaper and is great!
customer_reviews.author: Pina DiChiara

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my mom. She tells me it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Westie

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Super easy to assemble. Have not tried to disassemble, but think it will be simple.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A Cohen

customer_reviews.title: I love your product but it is not the right size
customer_reviews.text: Joe will you please call me. I love your product but it is not the right size. I want to return it for a wider seat. Joe please call me. I cannot use your product. It is not wide enough. You told me to call you with any problems. I did and you never returned my call. Please do not wait til after the return date. I cannot afford to throw away that much money. Lucy Mealia
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Lucy Mealia

customer_reviews.title: Works in a pinch, but think twice if you need real stability!
customer_reviews.text: This works OK and does what it is supposed to do. However, it isn't the most stable platform. If you are using it for someone that has balance issues, look for a seat with a WELDED frame, not one that has clamps, like this one. It will support a 200 lb person with decent balance, no problem. But it wobbles enough that anyone with balance problems, or that leans heavily on the armrests, should look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product. The chair is easy to set up ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. The chair is easy to set up and fold down for easier transport. The commode was adequate and there were no problems with urine on floor. It fits nicely over toilet and then at night to be convenient for use as a complete unit. I wish it came with a cloth or vinyl carrying bag to transport it into public places like a hotel/motel. My husband weighs 223 lbs and has a wide build so I think if this product passed our review that means it is an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Jogo

customer_reviews.title: All you need.  Well engineered.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a flat box went together nearly all by itself. Has adjustable legs and under test conditions worked perfectly I just love it. Simple and does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted one that would be sturdy enough that I would feel safe using it, and this has exceeded my expectations . I've been unable to use my feet at all, and have had to use a transfer board to get back and forth onto it from the wheelchair . there was only one time when I tilted too far to the right that I felt like I might fall over but I didn't, so that was good !
customer_reviews.author: Cathy 🐈🐇💞

customer_reviews.title: Good can!
customer_reviews.text: Is working out really well for my 86 year old mom, who has difficulty getting up and down. The handles make it much easier and the seat is wide and comfortable enough for her. She says she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved
customer_reviews.text: Perfect answer to being able to take a shower than a sponge bath. My wife placed the commode in our large shower and I sat there comfortably without fear of falling. Thank you for the product
customer_reviews.author: lyle e.

customer_reviews.title: ly easy. The quality of workmanship is excellent
customer_reviews.text: The bedside commode came on time and has proved to be invaluable. Th set up is extremely easy. The quality of workmanship is excellent. And most importantly it does the job it is advertised for. This is not an item you would consider until it becomes essential, but when it does the little things you don't want to have to think about become extremely important. This is one item I hoped I would never need but extremely pleased with both product quality and resulting enabling function.
customer_reviews.author: James D Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Still under scruitiny
customer_reviews.text: Liked we could transport it to friends who have a very low toilet that would be very difficult to get up from and we were staying with them for several days. Does not fold as flat as we had hoped, but it worked and am thankful for that! We like to travel by car and can never be sure of getting a handicapped room with high toilet. This would fill the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Merry

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy with adjustable height. Two issues with my sewer pipes, so I decided I needed a back up. Have not had to use it yet ,but I am prepared, and I am sure it will do what it is designed for if needed.
customer_reviews.author: VSmith

customer_reviews.title: Needless to say getting out of bed and walking to the closest toilet was painful. I bought this toilet and kept right by ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently had all of my lumbar spine and part of my thoracic spine fused. Needless to say getting out of bed and walking to the closest toilet was painful. I bought this toilet and kept right by my healing bed. So convenient and easy. When I've healed and am in better shape, we will use it when we go camping.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This model has worked the best because we can adjust the seat height to what ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom is in assisted living and we tried several kinds of seat lifts and bars on her toilet to help her. This model has worked the best because we can adjust the seat height to what she needs and the handlebars are just what she needs to raise herself. She is very happy with this. BTW we do not use the potty part but it seems well made and the cover is a great idea. And it folds so we can take it when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: middleoftheroad

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived exactly as advertised and without the bucket ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived exactly as advertised and without the bucket even doubles as a shower chair for my mother-in-law who is nearly bedridden.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together right out of the box and its actually nice looking compared to the old one I was replacing for my Mother. She said it is quite comfortable and doesn't feel as "plastic" like as the other.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Louise Bommer

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy and strong safety addition
customer_reviews.text: This commode is very strong and easily assembled. It is not too heavy to move around and is well made. Glad that we purchased it and that it arrived in a day or so. It filled the need we had economically. A solid and well built commode.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pizzuti

customer_reviews.title: well constructed easy to assembly unfortunately blue cross will not recognize amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: well constructed easy to assembly unfortunately blue cross will not recognize amazon for rembursement even with a precription for out of pocket expensives
customer_reviews.author: harold a heekin

customer_reviews.title: ... when I needed it thank you very much it's good to do business with somebody that's on their game ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in on time when I needed it thank you very much it's good to do business with somebody that's on their game thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Lupe Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable commode!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent commode. It is sturdy, easy to adjust the height, and comfortable. It easily fits next to my brothers bed and light enough to move when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Royne

customer_reviews.title: too narrow
customer_reviews.text: useable and good quality. Easy to assemble. Too narrow for my husband to use comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking unit but, it is not nearly as sturdy as the one we already have and it was one of the more expensive units. This is rated at 350 pounds. the tubular leg should have been bigger diameter. I have already donated this to a non-profit, it was never used in our household.
customer_reviews.author: Ric B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly Commode
customer_reviews.text: The assembly is innovative and easy to use. the stability of the unit is adequate but not as firm as one used in the rehab unit that was bolted together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Have used this extensively, very nice. Very happy we bought this
customer_reviews.author: Ronald P.

product_meta.title: Vive Bedside Commode - Narrow Folding Toilet Seat for Adults, Handicap, Elderly - Fits Most Liner - Adjustable Height, Portable, Lightweight, Wide 3 in 1 Medical Toilet Chair Stool with Lid
feature_bullets: VERSATILE BEDSIDE COMMODE OPTION: Providing a convenient solution to meet the needs of a loved one or patient, the folding commode is lightweight and has a 7.5-quart capacity pail with a lid and splash guard. The handles provide a nonslip grip for added stability. Can be used as a standalone unit, as a safety toilet rail frame or as an elevated toilet seat for an existing toilet and easily folds away for convenient storage and transport. Great for seniors and those with limited mobility.

TOOL-FREE ASSEMBLY AND ADJUSTMENTS: Assembly is quick and easy, requiring no special tools. Each push pin audibly clicks into place to ensure safety and stability. Easy tool-free adjustments raise or lower the chair height to safely accommodate any individual. The leg height is adjustable from 14.5” to 20” for individual comfort.

DURABLE NON SLIP DESIGN: Lightweight and corrosion resistant, the stainless steel construction provides a sturdy bedside option with a weight capacity up to 350 lbs. Each leg is tipped with a non-marking, non skid rubber cap for extra stability. The armrests are have a secure grip for standing or sitting.

EASY MAINTENANCE: The generously sized, 7.5 quart pail is easy to empty, with a convenient carry handle and pail cover to reduce splashes and spills. The pail can also be used with most standard commode liners for added convenience. The folding commode can be wiped down with disinfectant wipes or similar solution.
VIVE GUARANTEE: Unconditional lifetime guarantee so you can purchase now with confidence.
